# init(ellipseOf:)

**Initializer**

Creates a shape node with an elliptical path centered on the node’s origin.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(ellipseOf size: CGSize)
```

```swift
convenience init(ellipseOf size: CGSize)
```

## Parameters

- **size**: The height and width of the ellipse.

## Return Value

A new shape node.

## Creating an Ellipse Shape

- **init(ellipseIn:)**: Creates a shape node with an elliptical path that fills the specified rectangle.
